name: Folies D'Avarice
description:
GAME:

A Video Computer Game For Deux Joueurs
By L'Homme Pendu (Hangedman)
http://hangedmandesign.com


Made for TOJam 8, theme 'Unco-operative'.

RULES:

Rally balls to bank points.
Drop a ball to lose banked points to your opponent.
200 points wins (i think)

CONTROLS:

Both players play using one controller, each using one stick. (or keyboard)
Up and down (W/S, I/K) to change aim of throws.
Left and right (A/D, J,L) to move arm back and forth.
Start (Enter) to advance menus.
Select+Start (Space+Enter) to reset game.
